unnormalised: **Quora Post: Builder Reviews - Real Estate & Property**
normalised: **Quora Post: Builder Reviews - Real Estate and Property**

unnormalised: Hey everyone, thinking of buying a flat in Pune and overwhelmed by all the builders out there! Wanted to get your thoughts on builder reviews in India, especially for the Pune real estate market.
normalised: Hey everyone, thinking of buying a flat in Pune and overwhelmed by all the builders out there! Wanted to get your thoughts on builder reviews in India, especially for the Pune real estate market.

unnormalised: How reliable are these online reviews really? Has anyone had a particularly good or bad experience with a specific builder like Godrej Properties or Shapoorji Pallonji? Looking specifically at projects around Hinjewadi, maybe Baner.
normalised: How reliable are these online reviews really? Has anyone had a particularly good or bad experience with a specific builder like Godrej Properties or Shapoorji Pallonji? Looking specifically at projects around Hinjewadi, maybe Baner.

unnormalised: I'm seeing some amazing marketing for "Project Anand" launching on 26/01/2024, promising possession by Diwali 2026, but I'm wary. The price per sq ft seems decent, around Rs. 7000, but I want to avoid getting trapped in a delayed project like some of my relatives did back in Mumbai with 'XYZ Builders' project near Andheri back in 2010.
normalised: I am seeing some amazing marketing for "Project Anand" launching on twenty-sixth January two thousand and twenty four, promising possession by Diwali two thousand and twenty six, but I am wary. The price per square foot seems decent, around rupee seven thousand, but I want to avoid getting trapped in a delayed project like some of my relatives did back in Mumbai with 'X Y Z Builders' project near Andheri back in two thousand and ten.

unnormalised: What are your go-to resources for verifying builder reputations beyond Google reviews? Any recommendations for checking their track record with RERA? Also, any local Pune-specific forums or groups you'd suggest?
normalised: What are your go-to resources for verifying builder reputations beyond Google reviews? Any recommendations for checking their track record with R E R A? Also, any local Pune-specific forums or groups you would suggest?

unnormalised: I'm planning to visit a site on 10/11/2023 at 11:00 hrs to check out the sample flat. Any specific questions I should ask the sales team beyond the usual floor plan and amenities stuff? Iâ€™ve heard horror stories about hidden charges.
normalised: I am planning to visit a site on tenth November two thousand and twenty three at eleven hundred hours to check out the sample flat. Any specific questions I should ask the sales team beyond the usual floor plan and amenities stuff? I have heard horror stories about hidden charges.

unnormalised: Ideally looking for a 2BHK within 10 km of my office. Any insights from your experiences would be greatly appreciated! Thanks in advance, namaste! I want to buy before the price goes up again! Last hike was apparently around August 15, 2023.
normalised: Ideally looking for a two B H K within ten kilometer of my office. Any insights from your experiences would be greatly appreciated! Thanks in advance, namaste! I want to buy before the price goes up again! Last hike was apparently around August fifteenth, two thousand and twenty three.
